import { Component,Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sidebar', templateUrl: './sidebar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sidebar.component.css'] }) export class SidebarComponent { @Input() sideNavStatus: boolean =false; list=[ { number:'1', name:'Branded', icon:'fa-solid fa-b' }, { number:'2', name:'Home', icon:'fa-solid fa-g' }, { number:'3', name:'Home', icon:'fa-solid fa-cart-shopping' }, { number:'4', name:'Home', icon:'fa-solid fa-file-invoice' } ] constructor(){} ngOnInit(): void { } }
